attributes.action: urge the Chairman and Board of Tottenham Hotspur Football Club to induct Jimmy Greaves into the Club's Hall of Fame.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Jimmy Greaves was, arguably, Tottenham's greatest ever player, it is perplexing that the Club continue to ignore him, or, to refuse to induct him into the Hall of Fame.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Tottenham Hotspur FC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
